Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball scored a team-high 32 points
Devin Booker controlled the Suns offense in the first quarter
The Hornets scored the first five points of the fourth quarter off Bridges assists in transition
Miller turned around what had been a rough fourth quarter to hit a dagger three
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball is making a compelling argument to start the All-Star Game
Miles Bridges redeemed himself after a rough game against the Cleveland Cavaliers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hornets struggled to score their first points of the night
The Suns went seven straight points in the third quarter
Others: The Hornets will return to the court on Thursday night for a matchup against LeBron James, Anthony Davis, and the Los Angeles Lakers
The Sun host Trae Young the Atlanta Hawks on Thursday
